Contributing
============

Thank you for your interest in contributing to the Rule Engine project!

Please see the :doc:`CONTRIBUTING.md <../CONTRIBUTING>` file in the repository root for
complete contributing guidelines, including:

- Code of conduct
- Development setup
- Coding standards
- Testing requirements
- Pull request process
- Issue reporting guidelines

Quick Links
-----------

- **Contributing Guide**: :doc:`../CONTRIBUTING`
- **Code Quality Backlog**: :doc:`../CODE_QUALITY_BACKLOG`
- **Architecture Documentation**: :doc:`../ARCHITECTURE_IMPROVEMENTS`
